nodes.text: Mindra was a female criminal on Corellia. She was one of Dovor Dowwn's lieutenants until she went rogue in 1 ABY. To seize Dowwn's Corellian trade, Mindra set up covert smuggling depots as power bases. When Dowwn found out about one of her renegade depots, he ordered it destroyed. But before his men could attack the depot, it was destroyed by an agent of the Coronet Mining Corporation that had mining interests near Mindra's depot and had feared collateral damage.
Mindra is mentioned in a mission called "Gang War Threatens Mining Interests" in Star Wars Galaxies, available at Mission Terminals on Corellia.
